name: PVA: Sword Edition
description:
Thanks for Viewing PVA Sword Edition!



Let's get you started with using this!

  • Left arrow key(or A key) to move left.
  • Right arrow key (or D key) to move right.
  • Up arrow key (or W key) to move up.
  • Space to pull down on your sword.
  • During the boss battle, right-click to throw a fireball toward the mouse.
  • To pause in-game, click on "P".
  • Hit all of enemies to win!

    • Swords!

  • Beginner Sword, plain old gray. (Achieved in Beginner Level)
  • Gold Sword, shiny gold. (Achieved in Gold Level)
  • Ninja Sword, color mix. (Achieved in Ninja Level)
  • Sensai Sword, full of diamonds. (Achieved in Sensai Level)
  • Legendary Sword, rainbow-ish. (Achieved in Legendary Level)
  • Overlord Sword, so powerful in its white and blue color. (Achieved in Overlord Level)
  • God Sword, most powerful sword, even in its cover of blood. (Achieved in Boss Battle/God Level)
